item.title: The darkness
item.summary: !nanni's mother fears the night, whereas Tamme's does not. !nanni's father does not fear the night. In the darkness (which 'sat') lions kill one of the Ovaherero's cattle and their oxen go away.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4
item.author: !nanni (XI)

keyword.subkw: when the Ovaherero's oxen disappeared and the lion killed their cattle
Tamme's mother does not fear it
of !nanni's mother who feared the night
